Render complete page.

Render complete page.

render_page(package, name, data, path = "", depth = 0L)

Arguments

package
Path to package to document.
name
Name of the template (e.g. index, demo, topic)
data
Data for the template. Package metadata is always automatically added to this list under key package.
path
Location to create file. If "" (the default), prints to standard out.
depth
Depth of path relative to base directory. Used to adjust links in navbar, and to provide template variable root_path.

Built by staticdocs. Styled with Bootstrap 3.
